Description copied from interface: IDIYComponent
Draws icon representation of the component. This should not depend on component state, i.e. it should be treated as a static method.

getControlPointCount

public int getControlPointCount()
Returns:
number of control points for this component instance. May vary between two instances of the same type, e.g. DIL IC with 8 and 16 pins will have 8 or 16 pins although they are of the same type.

isControlPointSticky

public boolean isControlPointSticky(int index)
Returns:
true, if the specified control point may stick to control points of other components.

getControlPointVisibilityPolicy

public VisibilityPolicy getControlPointVisibilityPolicy(int index)

canControlPointOverlap

public boolean canControlPointOverlap(int index)
Specified by:
canControlPointOverlap in interface IDIYComponent<T>
Overrides:
canControlPointOverlap in class AbstractComponent<T>
Returns:
true, if the specified control point may overlap with other control points of the same component. The other control point must be able to overlap too.
